```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
set.seed(13)
options(digits = 3)
options(htmltools.dir.version = FALSE)

# set custom knitr settings
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  # comment = "#>",
  collapse = TRUE,
  cache = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  fig.align = "center",
  fig.retina = 2,
  fig.width = 12
)

# load bookdown to register theorem and custom engines
#bookdown:::register_eng_math(names(bookdown:::theorem_abbr), bookdown:::eng_theorem)
#bookdown:::register_eng_math(names(bookdown:::label_names_math2), bookdown:::eng_proof)

theme_set(
  theme_minimal(base_size = 18) )

# create default plot template for drawing functions
function_plot <- ggplot(
  data = tibble::tibble(x = 0),
  mapping = aes(x = x)
) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = 2, alpha = .5) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, linetype = 2, alpha = .5) +
  xlim(-4, 4) +
  labs(
    x = expression(x),
    y = expression(y)
  )
```
